snippet: Since 2010, the awards show on CBS has been adding viewers, and, not coincidentally, has been charging more for commercial time.
abstract: Since 2010, the awards show on CBS has been adding viewers, and, not coincidentally, has been charging more for commercial time.
lead_paragraph: What is the dollar value of the recent ratings turnaround for the Grammy Awards? According to one report, that increased viewership translates into an additional $750,000 a minute.

headline.main: Grammy Awards Said to Command $800,000 for 30-Second Ad
